Create Cancel processing Updating Do not display this message in the future. All
Central\nnode Create Cancela
Remove Map The map will be removed.\nThe photos in the map will not be removed from your device. Change parent node Makes the selected node the parent node. Remove Photo Remove the selected photo from the node.\nThe photo will not be removed from your device. Move photos Do you want to move the photo to the selection node? Remove node All subordinate nodes will also be removed.\nThe photos in the node will not be removed from your device. At first Let\'s create a map. Press "New Map" at the bottom of the screen. Creating a map Enter the map name and choose the color you like.\n(Colors can be added even after the map is created) Reflection of image cropping range In this image, the crop area is reflected when you take your finger off the crop line. It can not be selected The same image is already in use on another node. Please select again Select a photo from the "Images" folder. Select another image
An error has occurred Removed the image That node cannot be a parent node The current parent node Cannot make its own child node a parent node Please enter the map name The same images is already stored Failure The image was stored in the node\n(Images that are already stored will not be stored) Error: Please select from the "Images" folder

Node list\n(Click a node name to move it to the center of the screen) (No Name) Picture Node ・
Icon Description Node generation You can add a new node to the touched node. *Up to "5" nodes can be created in one node. Picture node generation You can create a node for storing photos.\nIf you want to store your photos, select this icon to create a picture node *Up to "2" picture nodes can be created on one node Node editing You can edit the node\nSelect this icon if you want to change the design or node name *If you want to unify all node designs, select the icon below at the top of the map screen Remove node You can remove nodes and child nodes from the map. *The photo associated with the node to be deleted will not be deleted from the terminal. Show image gallery You can see the photos associated with this node in the gallery. Change parent node You can change the parent node.\nAfter selecting this icon, you can change that node to the parent node by touching the node you want to be the parent. *"Picture node" cannot be a parent node New map You can create a new map with the touched node as the center node. Photo storage(linking) You can store photos in the picture node\nLet\'s create a photo gallery of related photos. Icon close You can close the icon.
How to operate the map screen The term Basic operation Map top icon Notes on images in this application Limitations
-NODE- The circular ones on the map are the nodes.\nYou can display the operation icon by touching it. -PICTURE NODE- Nodes that can display images on the map.\nYou can store related images in this node.
First, let\'s touch the node!\nYou can display the operation icon.\nBy selecting the icon, you can create a node or link a photo. *If you select the "? Icon", you can check the contents of each icon. Introduction of operation method 1 ～You want to create a new node～ 1.Touch the node 2.Select "node creation icon"
Introduction of operation method 2 ～You want to store a photo in a picture node～ 1.Touch the node 2.Select "Picture node creation icon" 3.Select your favorite photo 4.Touch the created image node 5.Select "Photo storage icon" 6.Feel free to choose your photo If you want to see the photos stored in the node, select "Gallery Icon"
About the icon at the top of the map screen. Overall map design changes You can change the color of the map and the design of all the nodes. View nodes in tree format You can see all the nodes on the map in a tree format. ～If the icon disappears～ If the icon becomes difficult to see, touch the toolbar to make it easier to see.
In this application, the image saved in your terminal is managed by associating it with the node on the map. ・If the image on the device is deleted or the storage location is changed, it will also be deleted from the map. Be careful. ・This application does not have the ability to delete images in the device.\nRemoving a node or photo from the map does not remove the image from the device.
-Up to 5 nodes can be created in one node -Up to 2 picture nodes (nodes for storing photos) can be created in one node -Node hierarchy can be up to 5 levels
